hadiths.text: Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as having said this:A person should not enter into a transaction when his brother (had already entered into but not finalised), and he should not make proposal of marriage upon the proposal already made by his brother, until he permits it

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ الْخِطْبَةِ عَلَى خِطْبَةِ أَخِيهِ حَتَّى يَأْذَنَ أَوْ يَتْرُكَ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of proposing marriage when one's brother has already proposed, unless he gives permission or gives up the idea
